html: We have SEVEN MILLION jobs vacant right now. These jobs are ready for workers to fill them -- if they have the skills. Apprenticeships can set workers up to learn those skills, take these jobs and boost our economy.
text:
We have SEVEN MILLION jobs vacant right now.

These jobs are ready for workers to fill them -- if they have the skills. 

Apprenticeships can set workers up to learn those skills, take these jobs and boost our economy.

html: Emergency declarations do not allow the President to circumvent the Constitution. President Trump’s exercise of national emergency powers is limited. He is not creating a new law or allocating additional funding. He is re-appropriating money already set aside for other projects.
text: Emergency declarations do not allow the President to circumvent the Constitution. President Trump’s exercise of national emergency powers is limited. He is not creating a new law or allocating additional funding. He is re-appropriating money already set aside for other projects.

html: It’s Congress’ duty to ensure the President is acting within his constitutional authority to address that crisis. After research and consideration, I believe Trump is acting within his authority to take this action.

html: The idea behind my bill is simple: put more pressure on Congress to actually do its job. It’s our basic constitutional duty to reach solutions and keep the government open. That’s our job. Let’s work together to make sure we don’t find ourselves in this place again.
text:
The idea behind my bill is simple: put more pressure on Congress to actually do its job. 

It’s our basic constitutional duty to reach solutions and keep the government open. That’s our job. 

Let’s work together to make sure we don’t find ourselves in this place again.

html: We’re all now familiar with what a shutdown means: -Limited access & strained service from the USDA for SNAP benefits -More TSA workers calling out sick because they worked without being paid -No funding -No progress That’s why we must do all we can to #PreventGovtShutdownspic.twitter.com/8ttHh5I92m
text:
We’re all now familiar with what a shutdown means:

-Limited access & strained service from the USDA for SNAP benefits 
-More TSA workers calling out sick because they worked without being paid 
-No funding
-No progress 

That’s why we must do all we can to #PreventGovtShutdownspic.twitter.com/8ttHh5I92m

html: Democrats have said they are willing to discuss our border security, including physical barriers – that’s a promising sign. I hope they make good on their word. We need to solve this problem because it’s our job. The American people are counting on us.
text: Democrats have said they are willing to discuss our border security, including physical barriers – that’s a promising sign. I hope they make good on their word. We need to solve this problem because it’s our job. The American people are counting on us.

html: Over the next few weeks, we have a great opportunity to address border security. Walls work. They’re a critical part of the solution for our immigration problem. We need a wall to keep our borders safe and lessen the drugs flowing into our country over our Southern border.
text: Over the next few weeks, we have a great opportunity to address border security. Walls work. They’re a critical part of the solution for our immigration problem. We need a wall to keep our borders safe and lessen the drugs flowing into our country over our Southern border.

html: Dear Media Types, Your job is to get the story, not get the President. If you dove into #buzzfeed headfirst yesterday, you own it, too. “If true” was a faint murmur “Impeach” was said 200x on CNN & MSNBC The 3 networks devoted 27 minutes to it Maybe just apologize?
text:
Dear Media Types,

Your job is to get the story, 
not get the President. 

If you dove into #buzzfeed headfirst yesterday, you own it, too. “If true” was a faint murmur

“Impeach” was said 200x on CNN & MSNBC

The 3 networks devoted 27 minutes  to it

Maybe just apologize?

html: Simply put, the House has now missed two opportunities to fix our broken immigration system and make our country more safe, secure, and prosperous. The American people deserve better than the failed status quo.https://twitter.com/RepSmucker/status/1012032895144415238 …
text: Simply put, the House has now missed two opportunities to fix our broken immigration system and make our country more safe, secure, and prosperous. The American people deserve better than the failed status quo.https://twitter.com/RepSmucker/status/1012032895144415238 …

html: The legislation offered by Chairman Bob Goodlatte that failed in the House last week – Securing America’s Future Act – was a great opportunity reform our immigration system. That’s why I voted for it.https://twitter.com/RepSmucker/status/1012032895144415238 …
text: The legislation offered by Chairman Bob Goodlatte that failed in the House last week – Securing America’s Future Act – was a great opportunity reform our immigration system. That’s why I voted for it.https://twitter.com/RepSmucker/status/1012032895144415238 …

html: This legislation also missed an opportunity to make needed reforms to our agricultural immigrant labor programs, make E-Verify law of the land, and address the vast worker shortage found in Pennsylvania and across the country.https://twitter.com/RepSmucker/status/1012032895144415238 …
text: This legislation also missed an opportunity to make needed reforms to our agricultural immigrant labor programs, make E-Verify law of the land, and address the vast worker shortage found in Pennsylvania and across the country.https://twitter.com/RepSmucker/status/1012032895144415238 …

html: The bill does not hold sanctuary cities accountable for protecting dangerous criminals, nor does it crack down on individuals overstaying their visa. These are two critical priorities that must be addressed.https://twitter.com/RepSmucker/status/1012032895144415238 …

html: 3/3: That’s why I’m contacting @DHSgov Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen to get more information from her about how Congress can prevent separating families while ensuring a strong and secure border.
text: 3/3: That’s why I’m contacting @DHSgov Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen to get more information from her about how Congress can prevent separating families while ensuring a strong and secure border.

html: 2/3: But our immigration system is broken, and currently allows for families to be separated. Congress should address this issue, and the first step is having all the facts.
text: 2/3: But our immigration system is broken, and currently allows for families to be separated. Congress should address this issue, and the first step is having all the facts.

html: 1/3: Reading reports of what’s happening at our border and evaluating current policy, you can’t help but have an emotional response. Like all of us, and as a father, I believe families should remain together whenever possible.
text: 1/3: Reading reports of what’s happening at our border and evaluating current policy, you can’t help but have an emotional response. Like all of us, and as a father, I believe families should remain together whenever possible.

html: Here are four ways the new tax code will be better than the old one: Lowers rates for all Americans Nearly doubles the standard deduction Doubles Child Tax Credit to $2,000 Provides relief from Obamacare's unfair and ineffective individual mandate #TaxDaypic.twitter.com/ABmprwcI1q
text:
Here are four ways the new tax code will be better than the old one:

 Lowers rates for all Americans
 Nearly doubles the standard deduction
 Doubles Child Tax Credit to $2,000
 Provides relief from Obamacare's unfair and ineffective individual mandate

#TaxDaypic.twitter.com/ABmprwcI1q

html: In 2018, here are some of the words most commonly associated with the old tax code: Old Outdated Burdensome In 2019, you will be able to say that the new tax code is: Fair Simple Working for you #TaxReformWorkspic.twitter.com/dqDytZd5co
text:
In 2018, here are some of the words most commonly associated with the old tax code:
 Old
 Outdated
 Burdensome

In 2019, you will be able to say that the new tax code is:
 Fair
 Simple
 Working for you 

#TaxReformWorkspic.twitter.com/dqDytZd5co

html: Now more than ever we must prioritize federal funding to combat the opioid epidemic that has swept across Pennsylvania and the nation. My bipartisan legislation would provide $250 million to Community Action Agencies to help those battling addiction.pic.twitter.com/FPOTldHJ8m
text: Now more than ever we must prioritize federal funding to combat the opioid epidemic that has swept across Pennsylvania and the nation. My bipartisan legislation would provide $250 million to Community Action Agencies to help those battling addiction.pic.twitter.com/FPOTldHJ8m

html: In just one year, overdoses from opioids jumped by about 30 percent. I introduced bipartisan legislation to combat this epidemic with $250 million for Community Action Agencies. https://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2018/03/06/590923149/jump-in-overdoses-shows-opioid-epidemic-has-worsened …

html: Lucretia Mott was one of the leading voices of the abolitionist and feminist movements of her time. In 1833, Mott helped form the Philadelphia Female Anti-Slavery Society, and later became a founder of the American women's rights movement. #WomensHistoryMonthpic.twitter.com/ZTeeH3KfU5

html: I met today with bipartisan House leadership. Among them was House Maj. Whip @SteveScalise, who recently returned to Congress after he was shot and wounded last summer. I presented him with an IDF Paratroopers Brigade beret as a tribute to his dedication to standing with Israel.pic.twitter.com/HhMn3I5ZTF
text: I met today with bipartisan House leadership. Among them was House Maj. Whip @SteveScalise, who recently returned to Congress after he was shot and wounded last summer. I presented him with an IDF Paratroopers Brigade beret as a tribute to his dedication to standing with Israel.pic.twitter.com/HhMn3I5ZTF

html: In today’s turbulent world, the historic alliance between the United States and Israel is more important than ever. Honored to meet with Prime Minister @Netanyahu today to discuss ways to promote security and stability, particularly by combatting the Iranian threat network.pic.twitter.com/p6n9KwT3QC
